comments:
Description:
"Add to report" is enabled when the focus in on the report entended the library

Build number:
2.2.0.v200706011-1025

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add report items, data sources, data sets, parameters in a library, publish 
   the library.
2. New a report, includes the library, open library explorer, choose one item 
   and right click to show the context menu.

Expected result:
"Add to report" is enabled.

Actual result:
"Add to report" is grayed out unless you select the corresponding node in "Data Explorer view" first.

Error log:
N/A
Several items should be able to add to the default location if the target is not specified, such as "data source"->"data sources", "data set"->"data sets". This is an enhancement.

Enable "Add to report" when selection is DataSource, DataSet, Parameter, Cube.
Fixed.

Choose the data source, right click to show the context menu, select "Add to report" and exception is thrown out.

Error log:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:
